ygData.subject: Re: At the Ark.
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine saw the rifle pointed toward his head, he drew his claws from his left arm. the sudden pain felt like a thousand pinpricks hitting him repeatedly. he

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lunarpine saw the rifle pointed toward his head, he drew his claws from his
left arm. the sudden pain felt like a thousand pinpricks hitting him
repeatedly. he raised his arm and with a mighty slash swipes Slayers leg,
(Let me know if this is to much.) cutting off his foot sending himself
hurtling toward the Earth.

He landed with a thud along the sloping mountain, skipping through the snow
and ice. he was alive but hurt. He didn't know how badly so he rested to
give his computer the chance to anylize his wounds.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 25, 2000 6:59 AM
Subject: Re: At the Ark.


> ::Slayer::
>
> Slayer growls, listening to Lunarpine's insult.
>
> "We shall see about that, Maximal," he says, taking out a rifle and
> aiming it down at Lunarpine's head. He begins to pull the trigger,
> but his finger stops halfway through.
>
> Something was wrong... His programming was telling him to fire, but
> something was defying that command. He tightens his finger over the
> trigger again, attempting to fire his weapon.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Lunarpine's shot in the shoulder on the arm holding on around
> Slayer. The
> > shock of the sudden pain causes him to lose his grip. Lunarpine
> retracts his
> > claws desperately reaching  out with his right hand and grabs
> Slayers left
> > ankle still trying to force a level confrontation on the ground.
> >
> > "You call yourself Slayer? so far the names full of false
> advertising." the
> > wolfbot claims as he holds on for dear life. He still wasn't sure
> about
> > weather or not his body could handle the fall. He looked down and
> saw
> > mountainous slopes with snow. they'd gone a ways since the battle
> began.
>
>
>
>
>
